siteid.title: Livefyre Site ID
siteid.description: Get this from your Livefyre admin dashboard (for example, 12345)

articleid.title: Unique article identifier
articleid.description: Used to uniquely identify a colleciton within your site (for examples, 'First Blog Article')

checksum.title: Collection checksum
checksum.description: Identifies the current state of collectionmeta found in the admin dashboard by viewing the collection

collectionmeta.title: Encoded string with collection info
collectionmeta.description: Get this from the Livefyre admin dashboard by viewing the collection embed code
